attributes.action: Make it illegal to have executive's compensation plans linked to stock price. They should be linked to dividends - a far better measure of business performance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apart from the IPO, any rights issues and bankruptcy, stock has nothing whatever to do with the company - it's just people buying and selling bits of paper, the value of which is set by a bunch of overpaid 20 somethings, with red braces, in the dealing rooms.









PS  If that last part is too inflamatory, you may delete the word 'overpaid'.

rejection.details: You might want to rewrite the last part as we do not edit petitions.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
